name: Treasure Hunter (itch) (Poisondart00)
description:
Ever wanted to be a treasure chest and hunt people? Yeah, Me Either... Good Luck!

Walk around the procedurally generated map with no minimap whilst looking for a blue orb on the ground... while being chased around by many treasure hunters.

Walk into the orb to move on to the next level. The enemies get faster, have more health, and do more damage.

Oh yeah and the enemies can go through walls...

Controls:

[Space] - Shoots a projectile that will do 1 damage to the enemy. Also takes 1 health from you.

Movement WASD and Arrow Keys.
